entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
